aic-pattern.title: AIC Pattern
aic-pattern.description: Deep dive into the Async/Interactive/Client (AIC) architecture that makes prokodo UI RSC-compatible.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Release history for @prokodo/ui — a record of all new features, fixes, and breaking changes.

components/accordion.title: Accordion
components/accordion.description: Collapsible accordion component with animated expand/collapse and accessible ARIA attributes.

components/animated.title: Animated
components/animated.description: Wrapper component that applies entrance animations to any child element using prokodo design tokens.

components/animated-text.title: AnimatedText
components/animated-text.description: Text component with character-by-character or word-by-word entrance animations.

components/autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
components/autocomplete.description: Searchable input with suggestion dropdown, async loading, free-text mode, and multi-select support.

components/avatar.title: Avatar
components/avatar.description: User avatar component with image, initials fallback, and size/shape variants.

components/base-link.title: BaseLink
components/base-link.description: Low-level SSR-safe link primitive used internally by Button, Card, and other interactive components.

components/button.title: Button
components/button.description: The prokodo UI Button component — a fully typed, AIC-ready interactive element with icon support, loading state, and redirect capability.

components/calendly.title: Calendly
components/calendly.description: Embeds a Calendly scheduling widget as a lazy-loaded inline or popup frame.

components/card.title: Card
components/card.description: Versatile container component with panel, list-item, and elevated variants — supports animated entrance and click handling.

components/carousel.title: Carousel
components/carousel.description: Horizontal sliding carousel with configurable autoplay, loop, and navigation controls.

components/checkbox.title: Checkbox
components/checkbox.description: Accessible checkbox input with label, error state, and controlled/uncontrolled modes.

components/checkbox-group.title: CheckboxGroup
components/checkbox-group.description: Group of checkboxes with shared label, multi-select state management, and validation support.

components/chip.title: Chip
components/chip.description: Compact label component for tags, statuses, and inline annotations — supports color variants and deletable mode.

components/date-picker.title: DatePicker
components/date-picker.description: Calendar-based date selection input with localization, range support, and accessible keyboard navigation.

components/dialog.title: Dialog
components/dialog.description: Modal dialog overlay with accessible focus trap, ESC-to-close, and configurable size variants.

components/drawer.title: Drawer
components/drawer.description: Slide-in side panel (off-canvas) with configurable placement, width, and accessible focus management.

components/dynamic-list.title: DynamicList
components/dynamic-list.description: Form-integrated repeatable field list — lets users add, reorder, and remove rows at runtime.

components/form.title: Form
components/form.description: Structured form container with built-in validation orchestration, submission state, and accessible error summary.

components/grid.title: Grid
components/grid.description: Responsive CSS grid container with configurable columns, gap, and breakpoint overrides.

components/headline.title: Headline
components/headline.description: Typographic heading component mapping semantic levels (h1–h6) to the prokodo type scale.

components/icon.title: Icon
components/icon.description: SVG icon component with 1 000+ icons from the prokodo icon set loaded on demand via jsDelivr CDN.

components/image.title: Image
components/image.description: Optimised image component wrapping Next.js Image with lazy loading, blur placeholder, and aspect-ratio control.

components/image-text.title: ImageText
components/image-text.description: Two-column section component pairing an image with body copy, supporting left/right layout and vertical alignment.

components/input.title: Input
components/input.description: Versatile text input with label, helper text, error feedback, start/end adornments, and all HTML input types.

components/input-otp.title: InputOTP
components/input-otp.description: One-time password input with configurable digit count and automatic focus advancement.

components/label.title: Label
components/label.description: Accessible form label component that correctly associates with any control via htmlFor.

components/link.title: Link
components/link.description: Styled navigation link component with internal/external handling, icon support, and all text variants.

components/list.title: List
components/list.description: Ordered and unordered semantic list component with optional icon bullets and nesting support.

components/loading.title: Loading
components/loading.description: Full-screen or inline loading indicator with spinner, skeleton pulse, or progress variants.

components/lottie.title: Lottie
components/lottie.description: Lottie JSON animation player component with play/pause control, loop, and autoplay support.

components/map.title: Map
components/map.description: Interactive map component powered by Google Maps or Leaflet, with marker, cluster, and polygon support.

components/overview.title: Component Overview
components/overview.description: Full matrix of all 52 prokodo UI components — category, type, CSS approach, and Storybook links.

components/pagination.title: Pagination
components/pagination.description: Page navigation component with first/prev/next/last controls, configurable page window, and accessible ARIA labels.

components/post-item.title: PostItem
components/post-item.description: Compact blog/news list-item component with thumbnail, category, title, and date.

components/post-teaser.title: PostTeaser
components/post-teaser.description: Card-style blog post teaser with cover image, category, title, excerpt, and author attribution.

components/post-widget.title: PostWidget
components/post-widget.description: Sidebar widget listing the latest or related posts with thumbnail and date.

components/post-widget-carousel.title: PostWidgetCarousel
components/post-widget-carousel.description: Horizontally scrollable post widget carousel for showcasing multiple blog posts in a compact strip.

components/progress-bar.title: ProgressBar
components/progress-bar.description: Linear progress indicator with determinate, indeterminate, and stepped variants.

components/quote.title: Quote
components/quote.description: Styled blockquote component for pull-quotes, testimonials, and highlighted citations.

components/rating.title: Rating
components/rating.description: Star rating input component with read-only display mode, half-star support, and accessible keyboard navigation.

components/rich-text.title: RichText
components/rich-text.description: Renders sanitised HTML or structured rich-text content with prokodo typography styles applied.

components/rte.title: RTE
components/rte.description: Rich text editor (WYSIWYG) with toolbar, markdown shortcuts, and image upload support.

components/select.title: Select
components/select.description: Dropdown select input with search/filter, grouped options, multi-select, and async loading support.

components/sidenav.title: Sidenav
components/sidenav.description: Collapsible side navigation component with nested menu items, icons, and active state tracking.

components/skeleton.title: Skeleton
components/skeleton.description: Animated content placeholder component for loading states — text, circle, and rectangle variants.

components/slider.title: Slider
components/slider.description: Range slider input with single value and range (min/max) modes, configurable step, and accessible keyboard control.

components/snackbar.title: Snackbar
components/snackbar.description: Auto-dismissing notification toast with severity variants, action button support, and smooth enter/exit animation.

components/stepper.title: Stepper
components/stepper.description: Multi-step wizard component with linear and non-linear navigation, step validation, and progress tracking.

components/switch.title: Switch
components/switch.description: Toggle switch input component with label, disabled state, and accessible ARIA role=switch.

components/table.title: Table
components/table.description: Accessible HTML table with sortable columns, striped rows, sticky header, and responsive scroll container.

components/tabs.title: Tabs
components/tabs.description: Tab panel component with keyboard navigation, animated panel switching, and accessible ARIA roles.

components/teaser.title: Teaser
components/teaser.description: Versatile content teaser card with image, category, headline, body, and CTA — the building block for marketing sections.

components/tooltip.title: Tooltip
components/tooltip.description: Accessible tooltip component anchored to any trigger — supports hover, focus, and click activation with configurable placement.

design-tokens.title: Design Tokens
design-tokens.description: Full reference for all prokodo UI CSS custom properties (--pk-*) covering colour, spacing, typography, radius, shadow, and motion.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Install prokodo UI with pnpm, npm, or yarn and add global styles to your Next.js project.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Use your first prokodo UI component in under 5 minutes — Button, Card, Input, and Dialog examples.

getting-started/theming.title: Theming
getting-started/theming.description: Override prokodo UI design tokens to apply your brand colours, typography, and spacing.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Overview of prokodo UI — a fully typed, AIC-ready React component library built for Next.js App Router.

migration.title: Migration Guide
migration.description: Step-by-step guide for upgrading between major prokodo UI versions.

versions.title: Versions
versions.description: Published versions of @prokodo/ui and their support status.
